noMoreLearningAlone.caption: Improve your teaching method
noMoreLearningAlone.description: Get your students hooked and eager to grow by enabling an efficient, approachable and fun learning method. How? With real people available for them.

efficientMentorship.caption: Give students what they need, when they need it
efficientMentorship.description: Create a new form of mentorship where peers get guidance and will be able to teach your students the exact skills they need, when they need it.

teachOthers.caption: Offer personal support and mentorship
teachOthers.description: Teaching others is the one proven method to provide incredible results. Give your students the opportunity to enhance their knowledge by turning them into peers with your mentorship.

video.caption: Increase market reach
video.description: What do you think works best when adopting a learning strategy? Following a video, participating in a passive lecture, or actively studying with a peer? If you answered study with a peer, you are absolutely right. Comprising your learning material in a video can affect the quality of your courses and the connection with your students. We value your knowledge and because of that, we propose a new learning method. We are committed to helping you increase your market reach with peers, and because of our way of writing step by step guides you won't lose any quality in the training, you improve it.

step.caption: Make your community come alive
step.description: Create an engaging environment that builds momentum. Your students get notified when someone gets new skills, when your fellow student becomes a peer and when new courses and skills are added. Students can always contact you or Skilltransfers for support if they want guidance in learning or general mentorship.

exams.caption: Increase revenue doing what you love most
exams.description: Growing is not an option, it is a certainty. Improve the quality of your courses by inviting structure and looking at your material from the eyes of a beginner. Our mission is to reinvent digital learning, and because of that, we are committed to helping you on your mentorship path. Our marketing tools and expertise are available to you from the minute you start.

success.caption: Your success is our success
success.jenny: They should have a system like this in college.
success.jeremy: It takes a lot of time to make educational videos, but now I’m building communities with it.
success.martha: Can't believe nobody thought of this before.

vision.caption: Our Vision
vision.subDescription: We are a team of developers, community managers and learning experts creating communities with the most connection-focused training system in the world. We step out of conventional ideas and believe that just watching lectures and videos is not the most effective way to learn. Instead, we offer a mix of peer-to-peer and blended learning, in order to achieve real connections and the highest effectiveness. If you share these ideas, we invite you to join us.

journey.caption: Our community creators
journey.description: Our economy has become an economy of connection. Its the most difficult thing to find and the most difficult thing to create. In order to find these connection we need to find people with the same views and interest. Our community creators are creating communities to find just that and we are supporting them in any way we can.

system.caption: Our learning experts
system.description: Essential to our communities is the quality. To be able to offer this, our learning experts are here to help community creators, peers and students and they are trained in the Skilltransfers concepts and general learning and development guidelines and practises.They also help in creating video content, explaining and setting up step by step guides and using the platform as efficiently as possible.

team.caption: Our platform Team
team.description: In order to support our ideas we need a great development team. People dedicating their time and energy to create a platform that supports new ideas, is intuitive, fast and stable, cost effective and scales gracefully. But also people who are willing to innovate and share knowledge the Skilltransfers way so people can grow and learn faster than anywhere else. If you are also a techonology enthousiast and want to learn fast and love sharing what you learned, we invite you for coffee!

upcoming.caption: Upcoming
upcoming.important: The coronavirus (COVID-19) is changing the world in ways we’ve never seen. Until further notice all events are cancelled.

select.communityDescription: Each content-creator can setup their own community with skilltransfers. This means their own communityspace which learners can join and sign in too to learn with our unique teaching method.
select.descriptionLeft: Create a new communityspace for your team or company.
select.descriptionRight: Find and sign in to your favourite communities.
select.titleLeft: Try Skilltransfers to improve your learning, for free
select.titleRight: Do you already know which community you want to join?
